name: @hhmi/task-submit-proofig-cloudrun
description: Cloud Run deployment for task-submit-proofig service

scripts.build:service: bash -c 'cd ../../packages/task-submit-proofig && npm install && npm run build && rm -rf ../../services/task-submit-proofig/dist && cp -r dist ../../services/task-submit-proofig/'
scripts.build:local: npm run build:service && docker build -t task-submit-proofig-local .
